tp:treatment-sec.p:
Neodontocnema newari Sabatinelli & Migliaccio, 1982: 107
, figs 3–4 ( type loc.: Kathmandu, Nepal ).

Miridiba newari
–
Smetana & Král 2006: 222
(combination; catalogue). —
Coca-Abia 2008: 681
. —
Bezděk 2016: 272
(catalogue).

We were unable to examine any type specimens of
Miridiba newari
. However, the original description and illustration of male genitalia given by Sabatinelli & Migliaccio (1982) prove that this species belongs to Morphotype I “
Trichophora
”.
